item.title: The Garden Lounge at Sukhumvit Park in Bangkok provides a versatile indoor-outdoor option for MICE events
item.description: The Garden Lounge at Sukhumvit Park, Bangkok â€“ Marriott Executive Apartments is a unique venue for gatherings in the Sukhumvit area. Combining indoor and outdoor elements, it offers a versatile space for 30 to 160 guests. High ceilings and comfortable furniture create a welcoming atmosphere. This lounge seamlessly blends several design concepts, creating a space that is both modern and traditional, as well as casual and elegant. Featuring lawn and garden views, the Lounge covers over 400 square meters and can host a variety of events from meetings to cocktail receptions.

item.title: By the second quarter of 2015, there will be four new JW Marriott hotels opening in Asia
item.description: Source: Marriott. The JW Marriott Hotel Chongqing. Marriott International’s luxury brand, JW Marriott Hotels & Resorts, is expanding its presence in Asia with four new properties scheduled to open by the second quarter of 2015. These additions include three hotels in Greater China (Chongqing, Shenzhen Bao’an, and Macau) and one in India (Mumbai Sahar). This expansion will bring the brand’s footprint to 28 hotels and resorts in the Asia-Pacific region, including 11 in China and seven in India.

item.title: The Autograph Collection is ready to make its first appearance in Australia
item.description: Australian companies have a new, upscale event location. Pier One Sydney Harbour is joining the Autograph Collection, a curated group of almost 60 unique hotels globally. This harborside hotel provides a picturesque setting for meetings and events, featuring eight meeting rooms with expansive water views. Source: Marriott International. From Sydney to San Diego - Autograph Collection set to debut in three new world class destinations, including Pier One Sydney Harbour in Sydney, Australia.
